snippet.title: Digital signal processing system design : LabVIEW-bases hybrid programming
snippet.description: Digital signal processing system design : LabVIEW-bases hybrid programming . \- 2nd ed. / Kehtarnavaz, Nasser Reflecting LabView's new MathScripting feature, the new edition of this book combines textual and graphical programming to form a hybrid programming approach, enabling a more effective means of building and analyzing DSP systems [...] Amsterdam : Elsevier, 2008. - 325 p. ; 1 CD-ROM suppl.
